column4: I have a problem.  I installed a xen kernel from Edgy universe.  Everything works fine except for xorg.  Same config file as with the stock edgy kernel, but I get "(EE) I810(0): No Video BIOS modes for chosen depth." when booting the xen-enabled kernel.  I also see the message "VESA VBE Total Mem: 320 kB" while with the stock kernel, it detects 8000 kB
Would anyone know what I should be looking into to?
